content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is the frame page of the UBS Budapest User Awareness (BC/DR) Training.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please download the training material by clicking on the below links and read them carefully.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":446561,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/872e0d8d-4c35-494c-88a9-4bc8b8fdbfae/EPM-BCPD_BCDR_WI-Budapest_UBS.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/872e0d8d-4c35-494c-88a9-4bc8b8fdbfae/EPM-BCPD_BCDR_WI-Budapest_UBS.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"EPM-BCPD_BCDR_WI-Budapest_UBS.pdf\",\"name\":\"EPM-BCPD_BCDR_WI-Budapest_UBS.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"872e0d8d-4c35-494c-88a9-4bc8b8fdbfae\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note that for legal reasons, they may have some overlaps with the general EPAM BC/DR training.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
